text: We are pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Bath #BA1 #BA2 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Bath #BA1 #BA2 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 09:30. Andi.
We are pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Sheffield #S21 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
All customers affected by a #powercut in #Heanor #DE75 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in the #Sheffield #S21 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 13:00. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in the #Heanor #DE75 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 10:30. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Sheffield #S21 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 10:00. Andi.
Engineers are working on a #powercut in #Heanor #DE75 and estimate to restore all supplies by 09:00. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Wednesbury #WV14 #WV10 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Ellie
We are sorry about the #powercut in the #Wednesbury #WS10 #WV14 and surrounding area. Our team is working on the issue and we aim to restore supplies by 02:00. Ellie
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Banbury #OX17 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
We are sorry about the #powercut in the #Banbury #OX17 and surrounding area. Our team is working on the issue and we aim to restore supplies by 15:00. Andi.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Axminster #EX13 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in the #Axminster #EX13 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 10:00. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
There is currently a #powercut in #EX13 #Axminster & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 08:00.  Siân
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #StokeOnTrent #ST2 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #StokeOnTrent #ST2 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 22:00. Geraint
All customers affected by the #powercut in #BS31 #Saltford #Bristol now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
Update #powercut #Saltford #Bristol #BS31. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 01:00. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #Saltford #Bristol #BS31 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 23:00. Geraint
